config.script:
logger = system.util.getLogger('editScheduleItem')
	queryPath = "app/Schedule/addSchedule"
	editQueryPath = "app/Schedule/editSchedule"

	editParams = {
		"scheduleID": self.view.custom.ID,
		"lineID": self.view.custom.SelectedLine,
		"quantity": self.view.custom.SelectedQuantity,
		"note": self.view.custom.SelectedNotes,
		"workOrderID": self.view.params.RowData[0].WorkOrderID,
		"enteredBy": self.session.custom.UserName,
		"scheduleStartDateTime": self.view.custom.SelectedStartTime,
		"scheduleEndDateTime": self.view.custom.SelectedEndDate
		}
	
	try:	
		system.perspective.print(editParams)	
		system.db.runNamedQuery(editQueryPath, editParams)
		system.perspective.sendMessage("addedWorkOrder")
		system.perspective.sendMessage('scheduleRefresh')
		system.perspective.closePopup(self.view.params.ModalName)
	except Exception as e:
		msg = 'There was an error updating schedule item: ' + str(e)
		system.perspective.print(msg)
		logger.warn(msg)

DisabledPopup.message: Please sign in as quarterback to proceed.
DisabledPopup.title: Invalid Permissions
